item.title: @KordingLab @Timothy0Leary @insom_ai333 @WiringTheBrain Updates to follow on this soon! We've discovered that the spectral properties of the weights in networks that respect Dale's principle is a big issue, and one related to the number of interneurons. Also, the learning algorithm you choose has an impact as well.
